name: Sam-willie
body:
Hi everybody,
My name is Sam Willie and I am from Nepal however shifted to India in order to continue my higher education.  I am currently working for [Letsgobhutan](http://www.letsgobhutan.com/) which is a travel company. This is from my home country, so I feel excited. I am currently learning web technology like maintaining website however my plan is to learn some programming language. 
I will be sharing my facebook connection soon, stay in touch.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
